audioText: J'aurais aimé avoir plus de temps pour finir ce livre important.
question: What does the speaker express about the book?
options: They would have liked to have more time to finish this important book
They are happy they had enough time to complete the book successfully
They think the book was too difficult and should be abandoned
They believe they need to start the book over from the beginning
explanation: The text states 'J'aurais aimé avoir plus de temps pour finir ce livre important' - I would have liked to have more time to finish this important book. The conditional 'aurais' expresses a wish or regret about the past, indicating they didn't have enough time.
